sources.title: Slightly Honorable Movie
sources.description: Political corruption abounds as a lawyer tries to clear himself after being framed for murder. You can find more information at the IMDB . The mpeg2 file can be loaded into DVDAuthorGUI (a free program) to create a DVD to watch on your television.

sources.title: Slightly Honorable (1939) PAT O'BRIEN ♣ BRODERICK CRAWFORD
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
The Director: Tay Garnett 
The Guys: Pat O'Brien, Edward Arnold, Broderick Crawford
The Dolls: Ruth Terry, Eve Arden, Claire Dodd, Phyllis Brooks, Evelyn Keyes

A tough-talking lawyer’s rivalry with a corrupt politico boss takes a deadly turn after he is framed for the murder of a young socialite. Not to be taken too seriously, it's a wonderful mash-up of Film Noir and Screwball Comedy styles.

sources.title: Slightly Honorable (1939)
sources.description: A lawyer is framed for the murder of a young party girl and tries to clear his name. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/slightly-honorable-1939/

sources.title: Slightly Honorable (1939) Pat O'Brien, Edward Arnold | Comedy, Crime, Drama, Film-Noir
sources.description:
A lawyer is framed for the murder of a young party girl and tries to clear his name.

Director: Tay Garnett

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Attorney John Webb, is fighting the crooked political-ring headed by newspaper publisher Vincent Cushing and his crony George Joyce, the district attorney. When Alma Brehmer, Cushing's mistress and Webb's former sweetheart, is murdered, Cushing and Joyce try to railroad Webb as the killer.
metadata.Writer: Ken Englund, John Hunter Lay, Robert Tallman
metadata.Actors: Pat O'Brien, Edward Arnold, Broderick Crawford
